member.name: T:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute
member.summary: Apply this attribute to a property of a command class (i.e. one that implements )

member.name: P:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.Name
member.summary: Gets the primary parameter name

member.name: P:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.ShortName
member.summary: Gets a shorthand for the parameter (or null if none has been specified)

member.name: P:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.Optional
member.summary: Gets whether this parameter is optional

member.name: P:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets a default value for the parameter (or null if none has been specified)

member.name: P:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.AllowAppSetting
member.summary: Gets whether this parameter can have its value resolved from the <appSettings> section of the application configuration file. If the value is provided with a command-line switch, the provided value takes precedence.

member.name: P:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.AllowConnectionString
member.summary: Gets whether this parameter can have its value resolved from the <connectionStrings> section of the application configuration file. If the value is provided with a command-line switch, the provided value takes precedence.

member.name: P:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.AllowEnvironmentVariable
member.summary: Gets whether this parameter can have its value resolved from an environment variable with the same name as specified by If the value is provided with a command-line switch, the provided value takes precedence.

member.name: M:GoCommando.ParameterAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs the parameter attribute
member.param: Indicates whether the parameter MUST be specified or can be omitted
Provides a default value to use when other values could not be found
Indicates whether parameter value resolution can go and look in the <appSettings> section of the current application configuration file for a value. Will look for the key specified by
Indicates whether parameter value resolution can go and look in the <connectionStrings> section of the current application configuration file for a value. Will look for the name specified by
Indicates whether parameter value resolution can go and look for an environment variable for a value. Will look for the name specified by
